fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pledge your loyalty to a player, giving them your identity and role immediately. If it's the first time you've targeted them, their defense tier will be upped and you can use one of your other abilities next night.
- Attack a player. If they've been visited by an Insurgent before, the attack tier is upped to Powerful and you attack non-Insurgent visitors.
- Select three players. Insurgent targets will be made Astral permanently, non-Insurgents are roleblocked.
- Make a player lynchproof for the next two days. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You're usually restricted to only using your first ability, but you'll be able to use any of your others the night after you use your first.
- If you pledge your loyalty to the Despot, you'll also be able to multitask up to two abilities the next night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who oppose the Insurgency.
